b'Anime Tenchou':
b"This is the Animation Store Manager!!

Anime Tenchou is a CM character for Animate, one of Japan's biggest retailer of anime, games, and manga. The character series was created by Shimamoto Kazuhiko for publicity purposes. Later adapted into a manga, a weekly radio drama and this OVA animated by GAINAX and directed by Anno Hideaki.

Anizawa Meito is the blazing store manager. He is a fireball who loves animation merchandise at heart. He takes over the dying wish of the former store manager, though still alive, who was attacked by the rival store and becomes a \xe2\x80\x9cstore manager\xe2\x80\x9d of newly opened animation goods specialty store, Animate. The scarlet, \xe2\x80\x9cstore manager visor\xe2\x80\x9d is his trademark.

(Source: AniDB)"
